tha-ap546:19.3: Vissāmabhūmi santānaṃ → vissāsaṃ bhūmisantānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vissānabhūmi santānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap546:28.3: Paccājāto → pacchā jāto (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sampatto ca (mr)
tha-ap546:31.4: sāriputtamahaddasaṃ → ... mathaddasaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sāriputtañca addasaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap546:33.4: yugamattaṃ nidakkhitaṃ → yugamattanirikkhataṃ (bj) | udikkhataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yugamattaṃ nirikkhitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap546:34.2: avocaṃ mamanucchavaṃ → avocaṃ mananucchavaṃ (bj) | avocamananucchavaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | avocaṃ mananucchaviṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap546:38.4: kacci vaṅgīsa jānāsi → saccaṃ vaṅgīsa kacci te (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
